title: VR-Based Clinical Decision-Making Competency Enhancement Course for Physical Therapy

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational physical therapy theory and over 3 years of clinical experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning combining VR simulations and mobile learning modules in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Improve the ability to assess neurological disorder patients and develop intervention plans by over 80% through VR simulation
Practice clinical case analysis at least twice weekly using mobile microlearning content
Verify a 15% improvement in treatment skill application accuracy every four weeks through formative assessment

resources: VR headsets (compatible with student personal devices)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
